dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Host_B, you hear about Canelo Alvarez? I mean, like, the numbers are just insane.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I did! Yeah, it's, uh, it's a massive deal. Minimum $365 million with DAZN, right? That's what, $33 million a fight?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, $33 million a fight. And he's already got his first one lined up December 15th against Rocky Fielding at Madison Square Garden. Then probably Cinco de Mayo?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, thirty three million dollars a fight. And he's already got his first one lined up December fifteenth against Rocky Fielding at Madison Square Garden. Then probably Cinco de Mayo?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And, uh, with those two DAZN fights, plus his GGG money and endorsements, he's looking at, like, $120 million in the next 12 months. Easy.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With the two DAZN fights, plus roughly $50 million for his razor-thin win over Gennady Golovkin last month and several million dollars from endorsements, Alvarez should bank at least $120 million over the 12 months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. And this is all happening, um, after HBO, like, totally pulled out of boxing, which is, you know, a huge shift.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a huge shift. DAZN's really stepping up. They, um, they signed that $1 billion deal with Matchroom Boxing earlier this year, and now Canelo. They're making a big push.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a huge shift. D A Z N's really stepping up. They, um, they signed that one billion dollar deal with Matchroom Boxing earlier this year, and now Canelo. They're making a big push.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It signed an eight-year, $1 billion deal in May with Eddie Hearns Matchroom Boxing, home of heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. So, like, how does this compare to other huge deals in sports? Because, you know, we've seen some big ones.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. So, like, how does this compare to other huge deals in sports? Because, you know, we've seen some big ones.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the only one really comparable in boxing is, uh, Floyd Mayweather's Showtime deal, right? He got like $200 million guaranteed for six fights, but then ended up earning, like, $450 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the only one really comparable in boxing is, uh, Floyd Mayweather's Showtime deal, right? He got like two hundred million dollars guaranteed for six fights, but then ended up earning, like, four hundred fifty million dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The only comparable deal in boxing history was the six-fight pactMayweather signed with Showtime in 2013. It guaranteed around $200 million... Mayweather eventually earned $450 million over the two-and-a-half year agreement...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, because he was, like, his own promoter too, right? Huge PPV numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, because he was, like, his own promoter too, right? Huge P P V numbers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mayweather eventually earned $450 million over the two-and-a-half year agreement, thanks to his dual role as boxer and promoter, as well as huge PPV audiences for his fights against Alvarez and Pacquiao.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Canelo's deal, it's right on par with Mayweather's per-fight average. And then you look at, um, other sports, like Giancarlo Stanton, $325 million. Or even Messi and Neymar, roughly $350 million each.

The Alvarez deal tops the 13-year, $325 million playing contract for New York Yankees slugger Giancarlo Stanton. Global soccer icons Neymar and Lionel Messi both have deals worth roughly $350 million...

dialogue_turns.text: So, he's really in that elite tier then. Like, potentially the highest-paid athlete next year, even over those soccer guys?

dialogue_turns.text: Wow. It's, um, it's just wild to see how the landscape of boxing is changing. And Canelo is really at the center of it.
